category: General Assembly of Representatives and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 22 (Notification of Agenda, etc.)
contents: Article 22 (Notification of agenda, etc.) ① When holding a board of directors meeting, the agenda to be submitted to the meeting must be notified 5 days prior to the meeting. ② When holding a board of directors meeting pursuant to Article 35, Paragraph 5 of the Articles of Incorporation, the person with the authority to convene the board of directors shall prepare and notify the agenda to be submitted to the meeting without delay. Revised on April 3, 2017 [Previous Article 21 moved to Article 22 on October 6, 2021]
